content: ‘…forced my ass in the chair even when I had nothing to say’ You know what, that’s exactly what I need to do!! There’s too much ‘talking’ in my head, too much thinking and waaaay too much procrastinating. You’ve just made me realise that I should not fear what to write on a blank page; to paraphrase a comment Julia Cameron says in her most famous book The Artist’s Way, on doing the Morning Pages, just keep writing, no matter how nonsensical it is. I just wish I could follow this advice. But I’m real happy Heidi that writing weekly for a year has proved great for you. Take care.
